summary: this will help you in replacing meshes and understanding a little bit as to how they work.
descriptionHtml:
this tutorial will help you replace, or \'move\' meshes to where you want them, such as moving the dark brotherhood armor somewhere else. or many armor mods you like replacing things you don\'t want them to, instead you can replace something you DO want it to.

any modders out there FEEL FREE to tag this in a description if it applies. ik trying to tailor to everyones needs is kinda hard, so this will hopefully stop the \'can you replace this instead?\' kinda comments.

thanks and good luck.
author: xirishx
